channel.title: The Two Fat Guys
channel.description: The continuing adventures of the "Two Fat Guys", who roam the country from chili cookoff to chili cookoff, and eat their own cooking.
channel.itunes:author: Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.
channel.itunes:summary: The continuing adventures of "The Two Fat Guys", who roam the country from chili cookoff to chili cookoff. Produced by Paul Isham and shot and edited by Dan Ramsey for Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The continuing Adventures of "The Two Fat Guys"

item.title: The Fat Guys Dance
item.description:
There's a moment of reflection occuring at the Chili cookoff, when Fat Guy Paul hears a crunchy beat on the overhead public address system. Suddenly, in the words of Steve Martin, he has "happy feat!" Watch as the "Fat Guy's Dance" is unveiled... and unnoticed.
Once again, produced by Paul Isham, shot and Edited by Dan Ramsey, both of VideoStory.
item.itunes:author: Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.
item.itunes:summary:
There's a moment of reflection occuring at the Chili cookoff, when Fat Guy Paul hears a crunchy beat on the overhead public address system. Suddenly, in the words of Steve Martin, he has "happy feat!" Watch as the "Fat Guy's Dance" is unveiled... and unnoticed.
Once again, produced by Paul Isham, shot and Edited by Dan Ramsey, both of VideoStory.

item.title: Two Fat Guys and the Chili Willy
item.description: The Two Fat Guys make their first stop on the road to world chili domination-- the Chicago "Chili Willy", a chili and salsa cook-off that reveals some of the secrets to competitive chili making. Will the Guys, win, lose, or draw? And will they eat their own cooking? Produced by Paul Isham, shot and edited by Dan Ramsey, for Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.
item.itunes:author: Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.
item.itunes:summary: The Two Fat Guys make their first stop on the road to world chili domination-- the Chicago "Chili Willy", a chili and salsa cook-off that reveals some of the secrets to competitive chili making. Will the Guys, win, lose, or draw? And will they eat their own cooking? Produced by Paul Isham, shot and edited by Dan Ramsey, for Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.

item.title: Introducing "The Two Fat Guys": The Polar Plunge
item.description: Welcome to the real-life adventures of Paul and Kevin, the "Two Fat Guys". The Guys compete in Chili and Salsa cook-offs around the country, and usually bring a video guy with them. But first, they test the waters of Lake Michigan--- after all, the Two Fat Guys SHOULD be able to withstand the challenge of "The Polar Plunge". Produced by Paul Isham, shot and edited by Dan Ramsey, for Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.
item.itunes:author: Brien Lee VideoStory, Inc.
